heading: HR00894
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT COORDINATING COUNCIL'S (HUDCC) FAILURE TO PROVIDE FREE AND ADEQUATE MASS HOUSING FOR THE POOR, ESPECIALLY IN LIGHT OF THE FORCED OCCUPATION BY THOUSANDS OF URBAN POOR LED BY KALIPUNAN NG DAMAYANG MAHIHIRAP (KADAMAY) OF THOUSANDS OF IDLE GOVERNMENT HOUSING UNITS IN SIX (6) RELOCATION SITES IN PANDI, BULACAN
principal-authors: ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; DE JESUS, EMMI A.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.;
